price: Zina-kiremwa, ico ari co cose gifise ubuzima kizopfa nta gisivya, n’aho coramba imyaka n’iyindi. Tuzonabagerageza mw’iyubahirizwa ry’amabwirizwa yacu, mu gihe c’amagorwa no mu gihe c’amahirwe mu buzima bwo kw’isi, hanyuma muheze mugaruke iwacu kugira muharurirwe maze muhemberwe ivyo mwakoze.
arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۗ وَنَبۡلُوكُم بِٱلشَّرِّ وَٱلۡخَيۡرِ فِتۡنَةٗۖ وَإِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

meta.transliteration: kullu nafsin dhāiqatu al-mawti wanablūkum bil-shari wal-khayri fit'natan wa-ilaynā tur'jaʿūna
